Package gw.testharness

Class CurrentUserTestUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.testharness.CurrentUserTestUtil
public class CurrentUserTestUtil extends Object
Provides utilities for modifying the current user during tests.
Author:
pdalbora

  • Method Details

    • runAs

      public static void runAs(User user, GWRunnable block)
      Runs the given block of code as the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - user to set as current user
      block - block to run
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is a temporary user.
      RuntimeException - if the block throws an exception, it is wrapped in a RuntimeException. This is to facilitate usage in tests, where you typically just want exceptions to propagate up the call stack and trapped by the test runner.

    • runAs

      public static void runAs(Key user, GWRunnable block)
      Runs the given block of code as the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - user ID to set as current user
      block - block to run
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is a temporary user.
      RuntimeException - if the block throws an exception, it is wrapped in a RuntimeException. This is to facilitate usage in tests, where you typically just want exceptions to propagate up the call stack and trapped by the test runner.

    • runAsSystemUser

      public static void runAsSystemUser(GWRunnable block)
      Runs the task as a system user
      Parameters:
      block -

    • setCurrentUser

      public static void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user for the current thread. This change only affects the current thread

    • setCurrentUser

      public static void setCurrentUser(Key user)
      Sets the current user for the current thread. This change only affects the current thread

    • createServiceToken

      public static com.guidewire.pl.system.service.context.ServiceToken createServiceToken(Key user)
      Sets the current service token for the current thread. This change only affects the current thread

    • createServiceToken

      public static com.guidewire.pl.system.service.context.ServiceToken createServiceToken(User user)
      creates a new service token for the current thread. This change only affects the current thread

    • getCurrentUser

      public static User getCurrentUser()
      Returns:
      the current user for the current thread or null if the current user has not been set.

    • setCurrentUserToSystemUser

      public static void setCurrentUserToSystemUser()
      Sets the current user for the current thread to the system user
